# postCode

**Instance Property**

The postal code of the place.

## Declaration

```swift
postCode?: string;
```

## Street address

- **thoroughfare**: The street name at the place.
- **subThoroughfare**: The number on the street at the place.
- **fullThoroughfare**: A combination of thoroughfare and subthoroughfare.

items.description: The street name at the place.
items.name: thoroughfare

items.description: The number on the street at the place.
items.name: subThoroughfare

items.description: A combination of thoroughfare and subthoroughfare.
